alert.note: Alert for Marshall (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 12:23AM CDT until June 16 at 4:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LOVE...SOUTHERN CARTER AND NORTHWESTERN MARSHALL COUNTIES... At 1222 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles south of Ardmore to 7 miles southwest of Wilson, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Marietta, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wilson, Dickson, Lebanon, Overbrook, Lake Murray, and western Lake Texoma. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
